title.rendered: Handyman in Vaughan: Benefits of a Mirror in the Bathroom

content.rendered:
When considering bathroom renovations in Vaughan, don’t forget about the mirror. The perfect mirror can transform your bathroom, while a tacky design can downgrade otherwise chic decor. How can you use mirrors to the greatest effect? Here are some tried-and-true ideas.

Create Dramatic Decor

If you’re tired of a humdrum bathroom, a majestic mirror can spice things up. Since a vanity mirror offers so many benefits, you can justify investing a little more money into something you genuinely love. For example, mirrors with ornate frames draw the eye and create an elevated atmosphere.

Going big is another way to create drama. A wall-length vanity mirror is convenient for checking out your outfit, making it an excellent option for ensuites. You can complement this flare with patterned wallpaper and shiny metal fixtures.

Brighten Up the Space

Mirrors are a well-known trick for brightening up dark spaces. Since bathrooms have small or frosted windows, they need all the light they can get. A light-up mirror is a great choice for powder rooms, as they provide extra illumination without the cluttering effect of fixtures. They’re the perfect way to freshen up makeup or check if there’s food in your teeth.

To further maximize lighting, choose a light colour for the bathroom walls. White is one of the top choices for its sun-bouncing quality, but any pale shade will enhance the effect:

  • Sky blue
  • Rose pink
  • Lilac
  • Lemon yellow
  • Mint green

Another fantastic tip is to choose flowy, see-through curtains or skip them altogether. Gauzy curtains let in more light while obscuring the view from outside.

Make a Grand Effect

Are you looking for a way to make your home more appealing to potential buyers? A new mirror may be the answer. An expansive model adds a feeling of grandeur that’s especially attractive for main bedroom ensuites.

You can further enhance your bathroom with eyecatching colors. Reflected in the mirror, these colors add vibrancy to a room that many homeowners leave dull. Chandeliers are another grand idea with a unique twist. These lighting fixtures come in a wide range of designs, ensuring you find one that fits your style. Chandeliers can also brighten a small room — and not just with the added illumination. Many designs feature dangling crystals or glass that reflect light in dazzling ways.

Expand the Space

Finally, the visual trickery of mirrors can make a small space seem larger. Reflections create the illusion of open space, which is why mirrors are so prevalent in apartment decor. If you want to make the most of a bathroom or powder room, get a corner vanity with a pivot mirror. This condensed vanity leaves more open space, and the pivot mirror allows you to angle the surface according to your needs.

You can further expand your bathroom’s appearance by keeping wall hangings to a minimum. A painting or two is alright, but any more than that feels cluttered, rendering the room claustrophobic. Additionally, look for furniture that caters to small bathrooms, such as over-toilet shelving. You can also take advantage of the space over your door for extra storage.

If you’re renovating your shower, consider a transparent glass enclosure. Doing so takes advantage of every inch of square footage, allowing the eye to see how big the room truly is.

Now that you have a few ideas for your next bathroom remodel, it’s time to contact a handyman in Vaughan. The team at Handyman Connection can help with flooring, plumbing, storage solutions and more, making us your one-stop shop for home improvement services. We’re happy to help you create a powder room design that wows guests. For more information or a an estimate, give us a call or visit us online.
